name: This Path Wants To Tickle You
name_original: This Path Wants To Tickle You
description:
This game contains-

1.18,000+ words to help tell it's story.

2. Multiple endings including several bad endings that end in tickle torture and one true ending!

3. Bonus content including a hi-res version of the games cover and a clean version!

Len is an adventurer who hasn't been on an adventure in a while and is starting to feel bored. One day her companion Neko tells her about a dangerous quest involving a dragon. Len is skeptical about the job, but decides to take it on anyways. Now Len and Neko have to get to the cavern where this terrible beast waits. Can they survive their journey filled with monsters that prefer tickling their prey? Or will Len and Neko end up tickling each other to death before the monsters get a chance?
